post.author: 오주환
post.content:
I think this speech is good to listen to so I introduce here.
One my dilemma. I can't write down at coska website at my home.
It's very weird because I can use any other Korean website at home but only for the coska I can't write down for any bulletin board.
I can't use Korean at my office. Poor me.
post.title: Steve Jobs Speaks at Stanford Commencement
